messages.message: @Aaron Vontell When you were thinking about the Cluster -> Classifier did you do any work. How hard would it be to create something that clusters and then builds a structure for the classifier to be trained?

Also how hard is it to fix the Review OCR to be mapped to the specific record you are on? Vs showing you every record regardless what record you choose? This is making reviewing highly variable documents very very difficult because in Refiner you dont have the option to *view image* (which may be a good feature to add) but in Review OCR it does not follow the mappings
